Summary

Programming

Through my experience in school and work I have gained experience working with C#, Java, and SQL. I was able to gain experience working with backend software development, mobile applications, and database design. This includes techniques such as object-oriented programming and LINQ to perform essential programming tasks.

Technical Writing

With the University of Louisville, I have completed large projects which required documentation, designing, and other technical writing skills. This includes UML design, use cases, prototyping, CRC cards, and more. In my profile you will also find case studies, which are to serve and example of analytical skills and making recommendations based on data.

These are examples of my work in web architecture. Here, you will find examples of html, css, and javascript. These examples are done with MVC, object oriented programming, and other modern methodologies.

This repository features examples from my computer infrastructure course. This lab features summaries of labs where I was required to use the command line to complete batch jobs and similar tasks.

Technical Writing

Case Studies

This is a repository for examples of my skills in business writing. During case studies, we were required to implement management principles, theories, and models in order to solve unstructured business problems.

Adelante Hispanic Achievers

Adelante Hispanic Achievers (AHA) is a non-profit client that I designed a website for along with a small group. In this document you will find examples of UML design, use cases, prototypes, CRC cards, and other examples of technical documents.

US Army Corps of Engineers Strategic Assessment

I performed a strategic assessment and made a busienss recommendation for the Louisville Branch of the US Army Corps of Engineers. This information is confidential, so if you want to learn more please contact me directly.

Ethics in Business Technology

This repository leads to work I did in a course that teaches the understanding and importance of business ethics in technology. The essays and case studies feature concepts and methods for making optimal business decisions in the face of ethical dilemmas.
